name: Card of Last Will
effectText:
If the ATK of a monster(s) you control becomes 0 by a card effect: Draw until you have 5 cards in your hand.
This card cannot be used in a Duel.

name: Armament of the Lethal Lords
effectText:
This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by Tributing 3 Warrior-Type monsters on your side of the field. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.
This card cannot be used in a Duel.

name: Tyr, the Vanquishing Warlord
effectText:
This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card, you must Tribute 3 Fairy-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.
This card cannot be used in a Duel.

name: Lorelei, the Symphonic Arsenal
effectText:
This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card, you must Tribute 3 Machine-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.
This card cannot be used in a Duel.

effectText:

This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Synchro Summon. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.

name: King Landia the Goldfang
effectText:
3 Level 8 monsters
Must be Xyz Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, while it has an Xyz Material attached that was originally Beast-Warrior-Type, you win the Match.
This card cannot be used in a Duel.

name: The Twin Kings, Founders of the Empire
effectText: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by Pendulum Summon. Requires 3 Beast-Type Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their LP to 0, while you control no other monsters, you win the Match.
pendEffect: Once per turn: You can banish 3 Beast-Type Pendulum Monsters you control, then target 1 Pendulum Monster you control; if it attacks your opponent directly and reduces their LP to 0 this turn, you win the Match.

name: Leonardo's Silver Skyship
effectText:
Her wings display her glory.
The proof of her glories are told in legend..

pendEffect: Once per turn: You can banish 3 Machine-Type Pendulum Monsters you control, then target 1 Pendulum Monster you control; if it attacks your opponent directly and reduces their LP to 0 this turn, you win the Match.

pendEffect: Once per turn: You can banish 3 Spellcaster-Type Pendulum Monsters you control, then target 1 Pendulum Monster you control; if it attacks your opponent directly and reduces their LP to 0 this turn, you win the Match.
